### Phage Library
<br>
This project is a library compilation of 14 complete phage genomes that target various *Salmonella enterica* serotypes. This serves as a starting point for genome comparison with newly isolated and sequenced phages. 
See the presentation [here.](http://mpark673.github.io/projects/phagelibrary)
